name: History and Culture
description: The evolution of human civilization and cultural diversity, showcasing the richness and charm of history from myths to ancient ruins.

groups.name: Ancient Egyptian Civilization
groups.description: The mysterious culture of pyramids, pharaohs, and hieroglyphics.

groups.name: Ancient Babylon
groups.description: The dazzling civilization of the Two Rivers and the Hanging Gardens legend.

groups.name: Maya-Inca Civilization
groups.description: The captivating atmosphere of sun worship and stone carvings in Central and South America.

groups.name: Chinese Historical Dynasties
groups.description: From Xia to Qing, the rise and fall of dynasties and their brilliant cultures.

groups.name: Ancient Roman Empire
groups.description: Gladiators, triumphal arches, and the magnificent city construction.

groups.name: Renaissance Period
groups.description: The resurgence of European art and science, with the emergence of masters.

groups.name: Ancient Greek Mythology
groups.description: The cultural source of Olympian gods and heroic legends.

groups.name: Courtly Noble Life
groups.description: The daily life of European or Eastern royal courts and nobility.

groups.name: Folklore Stories
groups.description: Heroic adventures and mythical tales passed down in various regions.

groups.name: Chinese Traditional Festivals
groups.description: The folk customs and cultural connotations of festivals like Spring Festival and Mid-Autumn Festival.

groups.name: Victorian Era
groups.description: Social changes during the Industrial Revolution and the gentlemanly and ladylike demeanor.

groups.name: Japanese Samurai Culture
groups.description: Samurai swords, bushido, and the political background of the shogunate.

groups.name: Norse Mythology
groups.description: The gods and goddesses of Odin, Thor, and the World Tree legend.

groups.name: Knights and Castles
groups.description: The European medieval feudal system and chivalry.

groups.name: Ancient Indian Civilization
groups.description: The birthplace of Buddhism, Hinduism, and multi-layered culture.

groups.name: Religious Art
groups.description: The artistic expressions of Christianity, Islam, Buddhism, and other religions.

groups.name: Maritime Silk Road
groups.description: The transoceanic trade and cultural exchange route.

groups.name: Pirate and Maritime Era
groups.description: The exploration, trade, and pirate legends of the Age of Exploration.

groups.name: Ancient Battle Reenactments
groups.description: The display of famous historical battles and strategies.

groups.name: Peking Opera Masks and Theater
groups.description: The national characteristic and artistic exaggeration of stage images.

groups.name: Folk Customs Around the World
groups.description: The traditional celebrations and customs of different ethnic groups globally.

groups.name: Indigenous Cultures
groups.description: The tribes and indigenous peoples who maintain their original way of life.

groups.name: Folk Handicrafts
groups.description: The traditional crafts passed down through generations, such as embroidery, pottery, and shadow puppetry.

groups.name: Evolution of Traditional Costumes
groups.description: The transformation from ancient attire to modern fashion.
